document.full_text: sony corp's ceo was unapologetic about the company's delay in informing the more than 100 million customers of its playstation network whose account information was stolen by hackers last month.
document.title: sony defends response time to hacker breach
lines_and_colors: sony corp's ceo was unapologetic about the company's delay in informing the more than 100 million customers of its playstation network whose account information was stolen by hackers last month.
